abstracts.cdata!:
The project would provide: (a)
            Buildings, furniture and equipment for: (i) the Swaziland
            Industrial Training Institute; (ii) the William Pitcher
            Teacher Training College; and (iii) seven Rural Education
            Centers. (b) Buildings, furniture and transport for: (i) the
            Curriculum Development and Education Materials Production
            Center, and three regional curriculum centers. (c) Equipment
            for: (i) the Student Career Guidance System. (d)
            Professional services (Architectural - Engineering). (e)
            Program Administration Expenditure. (f) Technical Assistance
            for: (i) the program implementation unit.
